qas.question: What is the name of the football club in Paris?
What is the name of the rugby union in Paris?
How many seats are in Stade de France?
In what year did Paris host the World Cup?
In what month is the Tour de France?

context: Paris is home to the association football club <a0_0>Paris Saint-Germain<a0_0/> and the rugby union club <a1_0>Stade Français<a1_0/>. The <a2_0>80,000<a2_0/>-seat Stade de France, built for the 1998 FIFA World Cup, is located just north of Paris in the commune of Saint-Denis. Paris hosts the annual French Open Grand Slam tennis tournament on the red clay of Roland Garros. Paris played host to the 1900 and 1924 Summer Olympics, the 1938 and 1998 FIFA World Cups, and the <a3_0>2007<a3_0/> Rugby World Cup. Every <a4_0>July<a4_0/>, the Tour de France of cycling finishes in the city.
